Tavatron:

Tavatron snarled angrily, she knew battled called but she also knew when to 
lay down her weapons and rest! Tavatron unsheathed her drill sword and ran 
in front of Dinobot.

She pointed her drill sword at his chest and stared him straight in the 
optics, a look of stern determination on her face. This time she wasn't soul 
searching, this time she meant business:

"We have been ordered to return to base. You are in no condition to fight! 
Primus help me if you do, because I will slag you myself if you engage the 
alliance!"

Tavatron had not meant to sound so harsh, but he had not risked his life to 
save hers just to get blown away on some personnal vendetta. Tavatron 
growled, her eyes narrowing to slits. She didn't want to hurt him, but she 
would if he didn't get to an 'R chamber right now!
